title: Enjin SDK
description: A SDK for creating games using the Enjin blockchain platform in Unreal Engine.
longDescription:
Enjin’s blockchain Software Development Kit for Unreal Engine enables developers to have a more streamlined communication with the Enjin platform, as well as gain access to cloud events and other utility features. Overall, with this SDK, game creation on Enjin has become a lot easier, let’s explain why —


Any developer or game studio looking for an easy, out-of-the-box solution to integrate Unreal Engine with the Enjin ecosystem may find what they need in this SDK, as its principal features include:

  • Use of the Enjin V.2 schema API through platform clients
  • Event service for receiving cloud events


With these features and functions for communicating with the Enjin Platform and Enjin Cloud out-of-the-box, the development process is significantly sped up. Along with an improved user experience thanks to cloud events and access to all GraphQL queries and mutations through the offered platform APIs.


This is an official Enjin SDK. With this in mind, users will have full access to Enjin’s support team here for any questions, concerns, or suggestions. As Enjin continuously grows, so will the SDK. To provide full transparency and adaptation to our users’ needs and requests, this SDK will be open-source and continuously evolve for the better as part of our goals of providing an open and accessible ecosystem for all.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Utilizes Enjin V.2 Platform API.
  •  Provides player and project clients.
  •  Provides event service for receiving cloud events.

Code Modules:

  •  EnjinSdkCore (Runtime)

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 147

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: https://docs.enjin.io/enjin-platform-sdks/

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
- Added `GetAssetsFromProjects` request to `IProjectSchema`.
- Added `GetBalancesFromProjects` request to `ISharedSchema`.
